headline: Salesforce Loses AI Chief Amid Major Push for Autonomous Agents
summary: Salesforce Inc’s (NYSE:CRM) AI head, Clara Shih, has departed to pursue another opportunity, the Information cited a report from JMP Securities analyst Patrick Walravens. The departure coincides with Salesforce’s Agentforce gaining traction, with Northland Capital Partners comparing it with Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT). Jim Cramer, host of CNBC’s “Mad Money,” held the platform responsible for the company’s current upside. Also Read: Meta Hit With $841 Million EU Fine Over Antitrust Violations Ti

headline: Salesforce (CRM): Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: Salesforce has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed 14.2% to $328.51 per share while the index has gained 11.5%.
